description.value: A black-headed spear of divine origin, this weapon was gifted to Sha’er Khan by an unknown foreign goddess whom he saved battling Eldrazor — her name since having been lost in translation, known in Ind only as the ‘White Maiden’. As a sign friendship, the Tiger God offered to repay the gift one-million-fold to the goddess and her followers. If wielding a spear, your allies gain the Damaging Quality, and each spear counts as Magical. The spearheads turn black, and any Daemons, Elves and Skaven struck by them suffer double the number of Wounds.
